biblio-self-driving-cars

2D/ 3D object detection, segmentation, depth estimation for self-driving car

View the Project on GitHub maiminh1996/biblio-self-driving-cars

3D Object Detection/ Evaluation Metrics

Metrics: AP 3D, AP 2D, AP BEV, AOS

3D object detection

visua-map

Metric Description Unit
AP 3D overlap in 3D (AP)  
AP 2D overlap on image (AP 2D)  
AP BEV overlap on ground-plane (AP Bird eye view)  
AOS oriented overlap on image (Average Orientation Similarity AOS)  

2D object detection

Metric Description Unit
AP 2D overlap on image (AP 2D)
